author: vanbesien
body:
7 modules in DQM/Physics that still needed to be upgraded.

Nothing special to report, it compiles and runTheMatrix -l 20.0 ran fine.

Some of the classes had a bit more complex structure, but nothing extraordinary.
DQM/Physics/src/SusyDQM.h was a bit special since it's all templated and the content you would expect in the cc files was all just added to the header file. I guess the person who wrote this might have had a reason for this, probably because of the templates, so I didn't change it.
title: Upgraded a bunch of modules in DQM/Physics to the new interface
